## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                            | Type            |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------- | --------------- |
| `height`  | `height`  | The height of the screen (for scaling) | `number`        |
| `history` | --        | Router history                         | `RouterHistory` |
| `links`   | --        | Array of `Link`s                       | `Link[]`        |
| `src`     | `src`     | The src of the background image        | `string`        |
| `width`   | `width`   | The width of the screen (for scaling)  | `number`        |
